name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Experienced Senior Firewall Engineer with a robust background in **Network Security** and **Firewall Configuration**. Proficient in managing and configuring leading technologies such as **Cisco ASA**, **Cisco Firepower**, **Check Point**, **Palo Alto**, and **Fortinet** systems. Adept at implementing security protocols aligned with enterprise standards, ensuring robust protection against cyber threats. Skilled in **Python** for automation tasks and proficient in **Linux**, with experience in **CI/CD** methodologies to enhance deployment processes.

Bringing 13+ years of experience in IT, delivering high-performance applications in the healthcare and financial sectors. Proven track record in **Docker** and **VMware** for containerization and virtualization, alongside hands-on expertise in cloud services on **AWS** and **Azure**. Knowledgeable in developing AI/ML-based platforms and applying **Ansible** for configuration management and orchestration. Strong understanding of compliance frameworks including HIPAA and PCI DSS, ensuring secure and compliant software delivery.
